meanings.definition: The use of aromatic plant extracts and essential oils for therapeutic purposes.
meanings.sent1: Aromatherapy can help relax your mind and body.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy the benefits of aromatherapy through scented candles.
meanings.sent3: The spa offered aromatherapy sessions to calm even the most stressed-out clients.
meanings.sent4: The soothing scent of lavender in aromatherapy is like a gentle hug for your senses.
meanings.sent5: After a long day, the calming effects of aromatherapy can feel like a breath of fresh air.

meanings.definition: The practice of using scents to improve physical and mental well-being.
meanings.sent1: Aromatherapy oils can uplift your mood and energy levels.
meanings.sent2: Some people find relief from headaches through aromatherapy techniques.
meanings.sent3: The office used aromatherapy to create a more pleasant work environment.
meanings.sent4: The power of aromatherapy to boost your spirits is truly remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The subtle art of aromatherapy can transform a room into a sanctuary of relaxation.
